products.name: Valentino Garavani Roman Stud Slide Sandals in Quilted Nappa
products.description: These Valentino Garavani mules showcase the label's latest reinterpretation of signature house codes. Crafted from nappa leather, the wide open-toe strap is elegantly detailed with diamond-quilting and gold-tone maxi pyramid studs. Slip this pair on to bring a refined and luxurious note to casual and dressy daytime ensembles.

• Heel height 65mm/ 2.5"

• Leather sole and insole

• Made in Italy

products.description: Named after its luxurious aesthetic, the Aura royalty gold kaftan extends Pankaj & Nidhi's fashion heritage. products.name: Neo Classic Nano Top Handle in Shiny Crocodile Embossed Calfskin
products.description: Timeless luxury unites with contemporary sophistication in Balenciaga's Neo Classic Nano Bag. Its petite structured silhouette, inspired by the house's iconic City bag, is crafted in crocodile-embossed calfskin with handbraided handles and gold-tone hardware that amplifies its opulent appeal. Carry it as an elegant companion to tailored daywear.

• Shiny crocodile-embossed calfskin

• Adjustable/removable leather strap

• Zipped closure with knotted leather puller

• Tone-on-tone logo embossed on front

• Front zipped pocket with knotted leather puller

• One inner flat pocket

• Nappa lambskin bonded lining

• Made in Italy

• If you select more than 4 products, then for every 2 units added, the product with the lowest price will be free.
• This offer is valid only on select products: these items will be tagged with a “Buy 2 Get 2 Free” badge.
• The offer is valid from 05.08.2018 until 12.08.2018.
• The offer cannot be combined with any other offer or promotion.
• The offer is not applicable to prior purchases.
• Terms & Conditions apply.

en_ae.priceMatch_howWePriceMatchTitle: How we keep our Price Match
en_ae.priceMatch_howWePriceMatchDescription:
We only price match with identical items, variations such as brand, colour, size and style are not accepted.
The item must be full price (discounted, promotional, outlet, second hand and sale items are all excluded).
The item must be in-stock on the competitor’s website at the time you claim.
The price must be in the same currency - i.e. AED/SAR/OMR/KWD/BHD. If your item is not set to one of those currencies, then we will price match to the following currencies, using the following exchange rates**:
en_ae.priceMatch_exchangeRateDisclaimer: **Please note that the above exchange rates may be updated from time to time to reflect exchange rate fluctuations, so please check the posted rate on the day you submit your claim.
en_ae.priceMatch_howToClaimTitle: How to claim your Price Match:
en_ae.priceMatch_howToClaimDescription:
Ensure you have set up an Ounass account, if you haven’t already you can do so here.
Contact our Customer Care team by email, phone or using the online form, with a link to both the Ounass item and the item you would like us to price-match.
Once our Customer Care team has agreed that your claim fits the above outlined criteria, your Ounass account will be credited.
en_ae.priceMatch_returnConditionsText: Once you have purchased using your Ounass credit, any exchanges or returns made on this item or any items we price matched from your original Order, will be given as Ounass credit.
en_ae.priceMatch_whatWeMeanTitle: What we mean by our competitors:
en_ae.priceMatch_whatWeMeanDescription: *Any website which has a luxury brand and product collection that we believe to be comparable to the brand and product collection offered by Ounass. For the avoidance of doubt, discount, liquidation, auction, outlet sites or websites that are undergoing closing down sales are not considered to be competitors. Sites that only display prices in currencies other than those listed above are not included. For further information or if you have any queries, please contact our Customer Care team.

en_ae.cash_on_delivery_return_policy_text:
We will issue a refund of the full face value of undamaged items duly returned (excluding, where applicable, the original delivery charges, cash handling fees, taxes and any duties):

(i) to your original tender type if you paid by payment card or PayPal

(ii) by issuing you with an online credit for the Website for Orders paid for via our Cash on Delivery service. Please note that for system reasons, in order to receive an online credit, guest check out customers will need to create an Ounass Account and register their details with us.

en_ae.contactUs_faq_heading_0: How do I make a purchase?
en_ae.contactUs_faq_heading_0_analytics: How do I make a purchase?
en_ae.contactUs_faq_copy_0: It couldn’t be easier to make a purchase with Ounass. Browse the site via the labeled categories i.e Clothing, Bags, Shoes etc. Click on your desired item, select the size and click ‘Add to Bag’. Your chosen item will appear in your shopping bag on the top right of the page. Continue shopping by clicking the Continue Shopping icon. When you are ready to place your order, revisit your Shopping Bag and select Proceed to Checkout. Follow the simple prompts to complete the checkout process. For further help or technical issues, please contact our customer care team from 10am-10pm on our UAE toll free number 800686277, email customercare@ounass.com, or WhatsApp +971 529291013.
en_ae.contactUs_faq_heading_1: I have not received my order?
en_ae.contactUs_faq_heading_1_analytics: I have not received my order?
en_ae.contactUs_faq_copy_1: Please contact our customer care team from 10am-10pm on our UAE toll free number 800686277, customercare@ounass.com, or WhatsApp +971 529291013. All our orders are delivered either Same Day or Next Day, depending on the time of order, your delivery location and the items you have selected. Please see our Shipping Policy and Terms and Conditions for more information.
en_ae.contactUs_faq_heading_2: How can I track my order?
en_ae.contactUs_faq_heading_2_analytics: How can I track my order?
en_ae.contactUs_faq_copy_2: A tracking number will be provided by SMS. You will then be able to use the tracking number to track your order by contacting the customer care team from 10am-10pm on our UAE toll free number 800686277, email customercare@ounass.com, or WhatsApp +971 529291013.
en_ae.contactUs_faq_copy_3: We offer a 30 day returns policy. Items must be unworn or unused and must be in a fully re-saleable condition, in their original packaging with tags still attached. We do not currently offer exchanges however, we do offer full refunds on eligible returns and credit to use on the site. Certain items may not be returned, for instance, items that have been personalized for you, any toiletries, and refurbished items. You can read our full returns policy here.

children.name: Designers
children.description: Gucci, Valentino, Prada and more

children.name: Alexander McQueen
children.description: The late Alexander McQueen was a fashion visionary who combined avant-garde theatrics with exquisite tailoring. In 2010 Sarah Burton took the helm as creative director, continuing the legacy of McQueen's iconic style. Lay the foundation of a stylish wardrobe with Alexander McQueen dresses, bags, scarves and more.

children.name: Alexander Wang
children.description: A young star of New York fashion week, Alexander Wang is known for his off-duty, dressed down aesthetic. Where beautifully cut t-shirts and grunge inspired denim, sit alongside sleek tailoring and sport inspired eveningwear. Just add a stud covered signature bag.

children.name: Balenciaga
children.description: Founded by Cristobal Balenciaga in 1917, the house of Balenciaga is a worldwide leader in major fashion trends due to its creativity, mas­terful cuts and exquisite techniques. Since October 2015, Demna Gvasalia, appointed artistic director of Balenciaga's collections, continues to uphold the vision of the house.

children.name: Bottega Veneta
children.description: Founded in 1966 in Vicenza, Italy, Bottega Veneta has always been synonymous with the highest quality of materials and craftsmanship. The brand continues to evolve its timeless vision through artisanal innovation, considered design and forward-thinking creativity

children.name: Boucheron
children.description: Founded in 1893, Boucheron is fine jewellery with a romantic French heritage. Not just for marking special occasions, their exquisite jewellery makes a contemporary style statement. Pick from diamond showstoppers and coloured solitaires from the house's timeless collections.

children.name: Chloé
children.description: Founded in the 1950s by Parisian Gaby Aghion, French fashion powerhouse Chloé continues to communicate "freedom, lightness and femininity" throughout lauded bohemian ready-to-wear and iconic accessories. Billowing hemlines, beautifully delicate blouses and tassel details exude effortless, elegant French style.

children.name: Coach
children.description:
American house of leather, Coach, blends heritage with fashion relevance. Discover your new favourite bag style on Ounass and receive complimentary monogramming in selected Coach stores.*

*Mall of the Emirates, City Centre Mirdif, The Galleria Al Maryah Island, The Avenues.

children.name: Dolce & Gabbana
children.description: A modern-day Italian goddess as imagined by Domenico Dolce and Stefano Gabbana, calls for statement accessories. Traditional animal print, glitter, and lace make way for heavily embellished shoes and bags with this season's standout slogans and motifs.

children.name: Gianvito Rossi
children.description: Handcrafted in Italy to the highest quality, Gianvito Rossi has been creating glamorous and original designs for over 10 years. From sky scrapper stilettos and barely-there evening sandals to statement flats and his signature over-the-knee boots, this is a designer to build your shoe collection around.

children.name: Golden Goose Deluxe Brand
children.description: Husband and wife duo Alessandro Gallo and Francesca Rinaldo, use traditional Italian craftsmanship to create contemporary sneakers with luxe finishes. Look out for metallic leather, glitter and flashes of colour on their artfully distressed trainers, all featuring the signature star motif.

children.name: Gucci
children.description: Eclectic, colourful and bold, creative director Alessandro Michele is taking the Gucci girl into a century hopping world of modern of luxury. Where a tie-neck blouse or heavily embellished dress has become just as recognisable as a pair of Princetown leather slippers or GG Marmont bag.

children.name: Jimmy Choo
children.description: World-famous accessories label Jimmy Choo was founded in 1996. Now with niece Sandra Choi at the helm, look out for glamorous new season updates such as the gold Hurley boots, available to pre-order by contacting our Customer Care team on 800 686277.

children.name: Malone Souliers
children.description: London-based shoe label Malone Souliers, is designed by Cordwainer Mary Alice Malone. Founded in 2014, the line has quickly become known for its unique yet elegant designs. Expect pencil-thin stilettos in mules and lace-up styles and buttery soft suede and leather flats.

children.name: Miu Miu
children.description: Founded in 1993, the little sister brand to Italian powerhouse Prada is a luxury fashion force in its own right. Expect Miuccia Prada’s signature code of impeccable-craftsmanship-meets-cultural-zeitgeist with a youthful, irreverent spin. Look to Miu Miu’s iconic playful bags, shoes, and more to lighten up your wardrobe.

children.name: Needle & Thread
children.description: Decidedly feminine, Needle & Thread is a go-to for self-proclaimed girlie girls. The British contemporary brand spins fairy tale confections with artisan techniques, from floral embroidery to expertly crafted lace. The brand’s ethereal dresses, skirts, and more sweet pieces make dreamy picks for the season’s occasion dressing.

children.name: Off-White
children.description: Virgil Abloh is the designer behind luxury streetwear label Off-White™, which launched in 2014. Expect oversized denim styled with shirting, striped track pants and hoodies, as well as baseball caps worn with '80s inspired evening dresses. Just add box-fresh trainers.

children.name: Prada
children.description: Founded in 1913, Miuccia Prada took the helm of the family business in 1978 when it began to evolve into the influential fashion powerhouse it is today. Celebrated for her intellect-fueled creativity, look to Miuccia Prada’s innovative design for both style icons—like the Saffiano bag—and forward-thinking must-haves alike.

children.name: Self-Portrait
children.description: London-based Han Chong's attention to detail, love of lace and embroidery, makes Self-Portrait's intricate dresses and separates perfect for weddings, parties and special events.

children.name: Stella McCartney
children.description: Renown for her razor sharp tailoring and original eveningwear, British designer Stella McCartney has a sporty flare that translates onto every piece she creates. You'll find this Brit cool aesthetic on everything from the statement eyewear to Vegan-approved Falabella bags.

children.name: Valentino
children.description: Pierpaolo Piccioli's modern yet romantic approach to gowns is what makes Valentino a firm red carpet favourite. It can also be found in day dresses and beautifully crafted separates. For a truly modern finish just add the shoes, bags and jewellery from the Rockstud line.

children.name: Zimmermann
children.description: Australian sisters Simone and Nicky Zimmermann founded their namesake brand in 1991. With a focus on femininity, colour and print, their expert cuts and silhouette-sculpting designs have earned the swimwear and ready-to-wear label a cult following. Look out for glamorous dresses and beach essentials.

children.name: Louis Vuitton Vintage
children.description:
The story of Louis Vuitton is one the fashion family knows and loves, where the LV-monogrammed travel trunks saw the rise of the label to a luxury atelier. The famous monogram and tumbler locks took off, dressing decades of luxury leather bags and more — giving us true vintage treasures.

Sourced from the label sustainable through authentic vintage luxury — 1954 by Rae Joseph — this item is a part of the curated collection chosen exclusively for Ounass. The unique selection is carefully sourced to only include pieces with a clean, luxurious and refined vintage journey. 1954 by Rae Joseph is a vintage fashion curation house based between the Gulf and New York City, launched in 2017 by its namesake with over 10 years of experience in the industry.

pdp.name: RevitaLash® Advanced, 2ml
pdp.description: Original, one-of-a-kind, RevitaLash®'s Ophthalmologist developed lash conditioner enhances the look of lashes. It protects against breakage, while improving health, flexibility and strength, for lashes that thrive, naturally. This award-winning serum is a proprietary blend featuring a scientifically-advanced technology. Peptides, lipids, biotin, and green tea extract, rich in Panthenol, condition and strengthen lashes while defending from environmental damage, as well as damage caused by lash styling products that can cause breakage and brittleness.

204767118.name: DayWear Sheer Tint Release Advanced Multi-Protection Anti–Oxidant Moisturiser, 50ml
204767118.description: This unique tinted moisturiser enhances any skintone with a healthy, even-toned glow. With our complex of skin-essential anti-oxidants, it helps fight free radical damage that can lead to visible aging. Skin looks smoother, more even-toned. Perfectly hydrated, powerfully protected, positively radiant. The lightweight formula transforms before the eyes into a radiant tint, with one sheer shade that works for virtually every skintone. Gives skin a fresh, even-toned new glow.
204767118.keyDetails:
• 50ml

• Multi-benefits in one

• Instant hint of tint

• Dullness, loss of radiance

• Anti-oxidant protection

• Dryness, dehydration

• Broad spectrum spf 15

• Dermatologist-tested

• Non-acnegenic; won't clog pores

How to use

• Apply every AM after your Repair Serum.

• Goes on untinted, then the tint appears as you blend it in.

204782702.name: Advanced Multi-Protection Anti-Oxidant Creme SPF 15, 50ml
204782702.description: Defend against the signs of premature aging with Estee Lauder's Advanced Multi-Protection Creme. So hydrating, it infuses skin with an intense surge of moisture that lasts 24 hours, and includes the brand's proven Super Anti-Oxidant Complex and Broad Spectrum sunscreen to act against dullness and fine, dry lines.
204782702.keyDetails:
• 50ml

• Normal to combination skin

How to apply:

• Apply morning and evening after a serum

210992098.name: Granite Brow Wiz® Eyebrow Pencil
210992098.description: The Brow Wiz® Eyebrow Pencil by Anastasia Beverly Hills is an ultra-slim, retractable eyebrow pencil ideal for outlining and detailing brows with professional-quality precision. Its unique wax formula delivers a high colour payoff and adds natural-looking texture for the appearance of a fuller brow. The ultra-fine tip mimics hair-like strokes in sparse areas of the eyebrow, while the spoolie end blends for a natural-looking finish.
210992098.keyDetails:
• 0.085g

• Shade: Granite, for black hair with a cool undertone

• Cruelty-free and vegan

How to use:

• Outline the eyebrow starting along the arch and move toward the tail end. Blend the eyebrow colour with the spoolie. Next, outline the upper arch and blend with the spoolie end of the eyebrow pencil.

210992102.name: Soft Brown DIPBROW® Pomade, 4g
210992102.description: Long-lasting with a buildable formula, the Anastasia Beverly Hills DIPBROW® Pomade has been a cult favourite for years. This beautiful pomade's texture effortlessly blends into the eyebrows, drying down to a completely matte finish. A product used by industry professionals, it offers versatility in application to create natural, voluminous results.
210992102.keyDetails:
• 4g

• Shade: Soft Brown, for light brown hair with warm/cool undertones

• Lasting, waterproof formula

• Cruelty-free and vegan

How to use: 

• Start with a minimal amount of eyebrow pomade on the brush. 

• Using the spoolie end of the brush, comb brow hairs upward, then outline the lower arch of the brow using the product on the brush end. Blend the eyebrow colour for a natural finish.

211025372.name: Advanced Night Micro Cleansing Foam, 100ml
211025372.description: Micro-purifying. Micro-revitalising. Estēe Lauder's conditioning formula transforms into a soft, airy foam that removes makeup and impurities, including pollution, as it purifies deep within skin's surface to improve an overall healthy look. The high performance formula rinses easily and leaves skin feeling clean, soft and refreshed.
211025372.keyDetails:
• 100ml

• Suitable for all skin types

How to use:

• Every night, massage gently over damp skin. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. Avoid eye area.

212889035.name: Ebony Mini DIPBROW® Gel
212889035.description: Anastasia Beverly Hills' highly pigmented DIPBROW® Gel now comes in a mini size that's perfect for on-the-go touch-ups. This long-lasting, waterproof formula delivers full coverage with rich colour payoff and effectively adheres to brow hairs before drying down to a seamless matte finish. The small, cone-shaped eyebrow brush is ideal for precise, professional-quality application.
212889035.keyDetails:
• Shade: Ebony, for black hair with a warm undertone

• Cruelty-free

How to use:

• To fill in eyebrows, brush DIPBROW® Gel onto brows starting at the arch and extending through the tail. Next, fill from the front of the eyebrow to the arch with the remaining product, being mindful to move in the direction of the hair’s natural growth.

• To fill in sparse areas of the eyebrow, use the tip of the brush to apply the eyebrow gel directly onto the skin and then blend through the brow for natural-looking texture.

• To achieve full coverage, brush the eyebrow gel through the brows a second time to create hairlike strokes. This eyebrow technique is ideal for creating a full-feathered eyebrow look. Use the wide side of the brush and comb through hairs in an upward motion.
212889035.ingredients: Isododecane, Talc, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Dimethicone, Beeswax/Cera Alba/Cire D'abeille, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Caprylyl Methicone, Trihydroxystearin, Triethylhexanoin, Trisiloxane, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Silica, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Propylene Carbonate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra‐di‐t‐butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate

213363148.name: Double-Ended Volumizing Mascara Set, 2 x 5.5ml
213363148.description: Designed to create naturally full and long lashes, the RevitaLash Double-Ended Volumizing Mascara Set amplifies any make up look by prepping and enhancing the lashes. The set's indigo blue primer and classic black mascara work together beautifully to create dramatic, richly pigmented and long lashes. Presented in a convenient, 2-in-1 packaging, the set is ideal for everyday use and will easily fit into any handbag.
213363148.keyDetails:
• 2 x 5.5ml

• Eyelash primer & mascara set

• Double-ended wand

• Volumizing effect with buildable formula

How to use:

• Remove any residual makeup. Apply the primer to bare lashes beginning at the base of the eyelash, twirling upward and outward. Using the same application technique, apply the mascara. Layer to build length and volume, ensuring product stays wet as you build.

213363149.name: Aquablur Hydrating Eyegel & Primer, 15ml
213363149.description: Nourishing with anti-inflammatory benefits, the RevitaLash Aquablur Hydrating Eyegel & Primer is a lightweight, yet hydratinggel thatgets the under eye area ready for daily make up application. Hyaluronic acid, sea kelp, kombucha and saw palmetto work together to create agel that's rich in fatty acids and vitamins to improve skin texture and soothe the sensitive eye contour area. Use daily for a naturally plumping, glowing effect.
213363149.keyDetails:
• 15ml

• Lightweight, nourishing formula

• Infused with hyaluronic acid, kombucha and sea kelp to hydrate and boost radiance

How to use:

• Dispense up to half a pump of Aquablue Hydrating Eyegel & Primer onto fingertip. Morning and night,gently smooth along the orbital bone including the undereye contour.

213634602.description: These professional-grade tweezers by Revitalash shape and define brows with comfort precision to create perfectly groomed, arched brows. 213634602.keyDetails:

• Hold the skin taut to help remove hair with less discomfort

• Tweeze stray hairs around the brow arch, removing only the obvious coarse/dark hair especially between the eyes

copyAttributes.name: Editor's advice
copyAttributes.value: These professional-grade tweezers by Revitalash shape and define brows with comfort precision to create perfectly groomed, arched brows. Slightly angled, thin tips sit comfortably against the skin while the easy-grip design allows for expert, stable handling. Its durable stainless steel construction ensures entended use for years to come.

copyAttributes.name: Ingredients
copyAttributes.value: • Rust-resistant stainless steel

copyAttributes.name: Key Details
copyAttributes.value:
• Resistant to rust and corrosion for extended use

• Suitable for sterilisation

How to use:

• Hold the skin taut to help remove hair with less discomfort

• Tweeze stray hairs around the brow arch, removing only the obvious coarse/dark hair especially between the eyes

213938928.name: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex, 30ml
213938928.description: The new Advanced Night Repair Serum by Estée Lauder delivers revived youth-generating power with quick results. The most comprehensive version of the patented formula till date, it now comes with Chronolux™ Power Signal Technology for deeper and faster penetration to reduce the look of multiple signs of ageing caused by the environmental assaults of modern life. Skin looks smoother, younger, more radiant and even-toned.
213938928.keyDetails:
• 30ml

• Suitable for all skin types

• Oil-free

• Dermatologist-tested

• Ophthalmologist-tested

• Non-acnegenic

How to use:

• Apply this face serum on clean skin before your moisturiser, AM and PM. Use one dropper. Smooth in gently all over face and throat.

213952404.name: Strawburn Brow Wiz® Eyebrow Pencil
213952404.description: The Brow Wiz® Eyebrow Pencil by Anastasia Beverly Hills is an ultra-slim, retractable eyebrow pencil ideal for outlining and detailing brows with professional-quality precision. Its unique wax formula delivers a high colour payoff and adds natural-looking texture for the appearance of a fuller brow. The ultra-fine tip mimics hair-like strokes in sparse areas of the eyebrow, while the spoolie end blends for a natural-looking finish.
213952404.keyDetails:
• 0.085g

• Shade: Strawburn, for light red hair with a warm undertone

• Cruelty-free and vegan

How to use:

• Outline the eyebrow starting along the arch and move toward the tail end. Blend the eyebrow colour with the spoolie. Next, outline the upper arch and blend with the spoolie end of the eyebrow pencil.

214089329.name: SigMagic® Brushampoo™ Liquid, 150ml
214089329.description: Give your brushes a deep, gentle wash with the all-natural SigMagic® Brushampoo™ Liquid designed to clean and condition brush bristles. Outperforming instant brush sprays that only remove surface-level makeup residue and bacteria, this unique formula penetrates brush bristles to remove even the toughest pigment and foundation stains.
214089329.keyDetails:
• 150ml

• Ideal for fluffy face brushes or blenders

• Antimicrobial and Hypoallergenic

• Extends brush lifespan

• Prevents the growth of bacteria up to 2 weeks after use

• Gentle on brushes, blenders and hands

• Cruelty-free and Vegan

• Formulated without: Fragrance, Parabens, Sulfates and Phthalates

How to use:

•

Shake gently before use and apply 1-3 pumps directly onto wet brush fibres. Swirl brush on cleaning tool to lather. Rinse with warm water. Repeat as needed. Rinse nozzle to prevent clogging.
214089329.ingredients: Aqua (Water), Cocos Nucifers (Coconut) Oil, Elaeis Fruit (Palm) Oil, Potassium Hydroxide
